Detailed Description

BtApplication is application of bluetooth. BtApplication is responsible for handle message posted by Apoxi-Bluetooth, construct menu entry, open and close corresponding bluetooth windows.

BOOLEAN BtApplication::OnAuthorizationRequired (  const BtAuthorizationRequiredMessage &  message  )  [protected]
 

Some Bluetooth Profiles have security settings that require authorization. When reomte device requests to establish a connection, OnAuthorizationRequired will be invoked. Local device has to decide whether to accept the connection or reject it. If the connecting device is trusted the request is answered by the Bluetooth Stack itself. Untrusted devices must answer the request by execuing a BtRespondAuthorizationRequest

BOOLEAN BtApplication::OnPasskeyRequired (  const BtPasskeyRequiredMessage &  message  )  [protected]
 

During the execution of a pairing request, a request for authentication will be sent to the Local Bluetooth Device. OnPasskeyRequired function will be invoked.To answer the recieved request for authentication the application programmer has to instantiate a BtSendPasskeyReqeust
